message:
it feels fuckin awesome smashing magazine re-tweeting something we worked on! 

@smashingmag: Quick and fast tool to record screencast, and you can even export them as GIFs. http://t.co/mvgMSWBzT8 - Mac only
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: will it be supported on Linux ?
We have only plans for windows support for now. but don't know if we will make it available on linux.
